entry.title: Blood Of The First Wolf
entry.summary:
Author: Werewolfbuckybarnes06

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,109Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Sooooo, hey everyone. Basically, I keep having the idea that Derek and Stiles have, like, super-werewolf-magic-hybrid babies (read Eli). This story centers around that concept, with a little adaptation from the lore drop we were given from Gerard about the origin of werewolves. I don't really know how to explain it, but they need the blood of the first wolf (hey, he said the title!) to protect Eli from an ancient cult wanting to bring an evil god from another dimension to earth. I hope I didn't give too much away. Hope you all enjoy.

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... entry.title: last of a dying breed
entry.summary:
Author: stxrbabie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,631Chapters: 34/34Kudos: 22

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never expected to care this much about Derek Hale‚Äîthe brooding, silent senior who barely spoke in the classes they once shared. But when news hits Beacon Hills High that Derek has taken his own life, something in Stiles breaks. Regret crashes over him like a wave. What if he‚Äôd pushed harder? What if someone had noticed the shadows behind those green eyes? At the funeral, a mysterious figure offers Stiles an impossible deal: Go back 27 days to the moment Derek‚Äôs path turned fatal. Prevent the suicide. Save him. But time is ticking, fate fights back, and getting close to the guarded lone wolf means cracking open wounds neither of them are ready for‚Äîfamily trauma, isolation, buried pain, and the slow, terrifying realization that connection might be the only thing worth living for.Every second counts. Every small act matters. And if Stiles fails, the consequences could destroy more than just one life. Inspired by In 27 Days by Alison Gervais.

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,089,329Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.
